overview: A live performed on August 5, 2011 at NHK 101 Studio in Shibuya, Tokyo.  Yellow Magic Orchestra, who has almost never done a studio live, played "RYDEEN", "FIRECRACKER", "COSMIC SURFIN", and others, in front of about 1,000 spectators selected by lottery. Keigo Oyamada, Tomohiko Gondo, and Christian Fennesz participated as support members.
title: Yellow Magic Orchestra - YMONHK
